channel.title: Thank you Hubi. You have done it again. Most awesome design I've ever seen.
channel.description:
Also a big thank you to: Ryan "rm249" Maffit Carlos "cman2k" Montero and James "Monkey-Junkie" McVinnie
I can't believe how good this website and forum looks. Absolutely stunning. Puts every other forum into shame.

item.source: Thank you Hubi. You have done it again. Most awesome design I've ever seen.

item.title: Thank you Hubi. You have done it again. Most awesome design I've ever seen.
item.dc:creator: Ed1
item.description:
First post of mine here just to agree with the original poster - the site design is very clean, I can navigate the pages easily, and whoever designed the wiki did one hell of a job too.

I just have one issue though, after clicking anywhere on the forums I can’t use the arrow keys to scroll up and down? I’m using IE 9, and I’m noticing a second scrollbar beside the actual scrollbar, and when I click on the original scrollbar, I can scroll with the arrow keys again.

Other than that somewhat cumbersome bug, great job on the site, and great job with the mod…I actually had a dream that I was playing BM xD

Read full topic
